name: Offroad Pick & Drop Bus
description:
This Off-road Pick & Drop Bus Game gives you a chance to play something else than the other boring type of off-road bus driving games.This new tourist Offroad Pick & Drop Bus game is require driving and safe parking skills. Offroad Pick & Drop Bus is the first off-road bus simulator driving game that will provide you to drive bus across different areas! Take people from one place and drop them safly to thier destination.
In this Offroad Pick & Drop Bus you have different missions of safe parking on hilly paths,by playing this Offroad Pick & Drop Bus you can improve your off-road driving skills.

Offroad Pick & Drop Bus: Feature
Different camera view
smooth control
Multiple level
Multiple buses
Nice background sound
